thread.title: Here's The One Thing You Never Noticed In "This Is Us"
thread.title_full: Here's The One Thing You Never Noticed In "This Is Us"

author: Essence Gant
title: Here's The One Thing You Never Noticed In "This Is Us"
text:
View this image ›
Nbc / Ron Batzdorff / NBC Don’t @ me, fam.
ID: 10568833 2. Like every episode, “The Pool” stirred up some major feels and left us shedding a few tears (sobbing uncontrollably). View this image ›
NBC / Via nbcthisisus.tumblr.com ID: 10568945 3. But after we collected ourselves and watched it again, we noticed something a little peculiar. View this image ›
Nbc / Ron Batzdorff / NBC ID: 10568957 4. At one point in a flashback scene of their childhood, brothers Randall and Kevin jump in a pool and actually get along for approximately 2.5 seconds. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10568976 5. Nothing to see here, just some care-free kids making a splash, right? View this image ›
NBC ID: 10569005 6. WRONG! If you look close enough, you’ll see a kid in the background doing the Dab. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10569022 7. Like, a full-blown, good ol’, Migos-would-approve DAB! View this image ›
NBC ID: 10569029 8. It’s also important to know that before he breaks out into his Dab, he gears up with a little Whip/Nae Nae action. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10569219 9. Now, that’d be totally fine and normal, except the Whip/Nae Nae and Dab weren’t dances until 2015, and this scene is def a flashback of the 80s. View this image ›
Nbc / Ron Batzdorff / NBC ID: 10569305 10. Once again, This Is Us has left us completely SHOOK and unstable! View this image ›
NBC And we’re still gonna watch because it’s just that good.
ID: 10569326 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
